Omiscid::Mutex

Detailed Description

Mutex Implementation.

Mutex enables to lock some code section to avoid multiple access by several threads. The mutex are not reentrant.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

Sebastien Pesnel

Member Function Documentation

bool Mutex::EnterMutex (  ) 

Lock the mutex.

Wait if the mutex is already locked, until it is unlocked, and then locks the mutex

Returns:
false if an error occured

bool Mutex::LeaveMutex (  ) 

Unlock the mutex.

Enables other clients to use the critical section protected by this mutex.
